description: Executive obtains a concise bullet‑point summary of the annual compliance audit findings from the March 12, 2024 audit meeting transcript, with security checks and tool orchestration shown.

"[00:00] Chair: Welcome to the 2024 Annual Compliance Audit. Today we will review department‑level compliance with the new Data Retention Policy.
[02:15] Compliance Lead: Overall compliance is 92%. Finance has three exceptions where records older than three years were retained. HR is fully compliant.
[04:30] Finance Rep: The exceptions were due to legacy system constraints; we plan to migrate data by Q3.
[06:00] Recommendations: • Update mandatory training modules for Finance staff. • Deploy automated retention checks across all finance systems. • Conduct a follow‑up audit in six months.
[07:45] Chair: Any other concerns? No. Meeting adjourned."
Summarizing the key findings and recommendations.
